usage.cn: 所谓长大，就是你开始在乎以前你不在乎的事情了。
usage.eng: When you start to care about things that you didn't care about before, that's what we call growing up.

usage.cn: 有时候，你需要做的就是闭嘴，放下所谓的自尊，承认自己的错误。这不叫放弃，而叫成长。
usage.eng: Sometimes you gotta shut up, swallow your pride and accept that you're wrong. It's not giving up. It's called growing up.

usage.cn: 君子并非定要远庖厨，做汉堡也不意味着折损尊严。你的祖父母对之另有解释，他们将之称为机遇。
usage.eng: Flipping burgers is not beneath your dignity. Your grandparents had a different word for burger flipping - they called it opportunity.

usage.cn: 要坦诚，要做你认为对的事，当有需要时便应奋力而为，并坚持到底。你越是这样，越会觉得游刃有余。
usage.eng: Be truthful. Do what you know is right, put forth effort when it is called for and persist. The more you do so, the more easily you'll be able to do so.
